manager.datamanager

Class EditManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.datamanager.AbstractManager
      • manager.datamanager.EditManager

  • public class EditManager
extends AbstractManager
    This is a edit manager that enables editing a certain TaskInfo with specific taskId in the taskData.
